mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "TstCaseComments" o WHERE o."caseId" = #{caseId} AND NOT o.deleted AND NOT o.disabled ORDER BY o."updateTime" ASC LIMIT 15

SELECT o.*, usr.id "userId", usr."nickname" "userName", usr."avatar" "userAvatar"
FROM "TstCaseComments" o JOIN "TstUser" usr ON o."userId" = usr.id
WHERE o."caseId" = #{id} AND NOT o.deleted AND NOT o.disabled
ORDER BY o."updateTime" DESC LIMIT 15;
mapper.insert:
insert into "TstCaseComments" (summary, content, "caseId", "userId", "createTime", "updateTime", deleted, disabled)
values (#{summary}, #{content}, #{caseId}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{deleted}, #{disabled})
